catalog_info.title: Colloquium in American Religious History
catalog_info.notes: TBD , Instructor to be determined (spring term) Open, with instructor's permission, to doctoral students in other fields of religious studies or American studies. Course meets bi-weekly. Students must complete both terms of this course (parts A and B) within the same academic year in order to receive credit. Offered jointly with the Divinity School as 2390A.
catalog_info.description: Presentation and discussion of the research of doctoral candidates in American religious history. Students must complete both terms of this course (parts A and B) within the same academic year in order to receive credit.
